DOC.brief_summary: A multe-center, non-interventional study in Europe to evaluate Pliaglis in daily practice
DOC.brief_title: A Non-interventional Study to Evaluate the Use of Pliaglis in Daily Practice
DOC.detailed_description: A multi-center, non-interventional study, including up to 700 subjects at approximately 70 sites in 5 European countries to evaluate the post-market safety profile of Pliaglis and the efficacy of Pliaglis in terms of pain reduction, satisfaction with the product and daily practice use prior to pre-defined aesthetic procedures.
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Patient treated with Pliaglis by the Investigator or other healthcare professional according to label (refer to SmPC) Patient had already consented to receive any one or more of the following aesthetic procedures after Pliaglis administration: 1. Pulseddye laser therapy 2. Laserassisted hair removal 3. Nonablative laser resurfacing 4. Dermal filler injection 5. Vascular access Patient treated with other injectable or topical anaesthetic(s) for the predefined aesthetic procedure Previous participation in this study
